stimulusHtml: Carlos wants to lose weight but is having a hard time motivating himself to go to the gym after work because he enjoys watching movies after work instead. To increase his likelihood of going to the gym, Carlos should
choicesHtml: reward himself just before going to the gym
set a goal of going to the gym at least seven times a week
reward himself immediately after going to the gym
make an effort to spend time watching movies when not at the gym
